name: Hang Up Pictures
overview:
Established in 1998 and with experience stretching back many years Hang-Up Pictures are recognised specialists in street art and are particularly adept at sourcing limited edition Banksy prints.

Hang-Up Pictures supply artwork and limited edition prints to its varied client base of collectors and fans across the globe.

The company is slit into two divisions Hang-Up Urban which originated first and focuses on street art. Hang-Up Urban represents fresh and exciting young artists from across the globe and also deals in work including Banksy, Faile, Polly Morgan, Futura + many more

Hang-Up Contemporary focuses as the name suggest on contemporary art and works directly with print publishers including the CCA Galleries and Sir Peter Blake and also deals in and sources work from names including Harland Miller, , Mario Testino

The company is located in the Shoreditch, London operating from a large 1200 sq ft open loft space shared with sister company Hang-Up Contemporary.
